Unauthorized modifications detected in t.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4656
Unauthorized modifications detected in t.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation events with command lines indicating low-level disk access or tools. Monitor Event ID 4656 for attempts to gain raw handle access to physical drives (e.g., \\.\PhysicalDriveX). Identify patterns or outliers in process execution frequency (descriptive statistics) correlated with system restarts or unusual shutdown events.
